/usr/bin/c++    -pthread -fopenmp  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse  -march=native -mavx2  -march=native -mfma  -std=c++14 -pthread -fopenmp  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse  -march=native -mavx2  -march=native -mfma   CMakeFiles/demo_VEH_DeformableSoil.dir/demo_VEH_DeformableSoil.cpp.o  -o ../../../../bin/demo_VEH_DeformableSoil -rdynamic ../../../../lib64/libChronoEngine_vehicle.so /usr/local/lib/libIrrlicht.so -lXxf86vm -lglut -lX11 -lGL ../../../../lib64/libChronoEngine_irrlicht.so /usr/local/lib/libIrrlicht.so -lXxf86vm -lglut -lX11 -lGL ../../../../lib64/libChronoEngine_fea.so ../../../../lib64/libChronoEngine.so -lpthread /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -Wl,-rpath,/opt/chrono/chrono_build/lib64:/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib/openmpi/lib:
